    • Constructor Detail

      • CSVReader

        public CSVReader(java.lang.String resource,
                 int headerLines)
        Opens the given file from the root data path. Sets class state variables.
        Then reads and trashes headerLines.
        Parameters:
        resource - Path to resource.
        headerLines - Number of lines to skip.

      • CSVReader

        public CSVReader(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                 int headerLines)
        Opens the given file from the given inputStream. Sets class state variables.
        Then reads and trashes headerLines.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - stream to resource.
        headerLines - Number of lines to skip.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read(java.io.InputStream stream)
        Reads CSV data from an input stream, parsing it into a record structure compatible with the Apache reader.
        Parameters:
        stream - An input stream.

      • readRecord

        public java.lang.String[] readRecord(int fieldCount)
        Reads a record from class field reader
        Automatically closes the file if end-of-file or a record is read with a number of fields not equal to the input fieldCount.
        Parameters:
        fieldCount - expected number of fields. If fieldCount == 0, then reads any number of fields.
        Returns:
        String[] of fields of that record or null if end-of-file or error.

      • readRecord

        public java.lang.String[] readRecord()
        Reads a record from class field reader
        Automatically closes the file if end-of-file.
        Returns:
        String[] of fields of that record or null if end-of-file or error.
